resources.string: Bright golden yellow color with fine and persistent foam.
Bright golden yellow color with a natural opalescence, it has a compact and persistent foam.
Beautiful bright golden yellow color with a white head of little persistence.

Bright golden yellow color with fine and persistent foam. The nose releases aromas of orange blossom, caramel and hops, accompanied by a delicate hint of honey in a complex of elegance and pleasantness that is also confirmed on the palate, where freshness and roundness envelop a moderately persistence bitter and well balanced. \ u000D \ n \ u000D \ nIdeal for an aperitif of cheeses and salami, it also goes well with tasty baked fish.
